text: Bao ke Ba-kholoang, ba-bakholoang ho Allah le ho Moromuoa oa Hae, bao nakong eo ba khobokaneng ho eena ka litaba tse hlokang sechaba, ba sa sutheng pel’a hae ho fihlela ba kopile tumello ho eena. Haele ba kopang tumello ea hau, bao ke bona ba kholoang ho Allah le ho Moromuoa oa Hae. Kahoo, haeba ba u kopa tumello ka litaba tse ling tsa bona, fana ka tumello ho bao u khahloang ke bona, u be u ba kopele ts’oarelo ea Allah. Ruri! Allah U ts’oarela-joalo-joalo, U Tletse Mohau
